divs: Sighting Detailsi had to guess on duraationg because this is maybe a landing spot if i didnt put anyting for durationg then the form will not go through.. ok .. well i walked outside and hubby asked me what happened to the yard i said i dont know .. there was this circle of dead grass and a ssquare .. i had a thought ufo .but didnt say anything.. i kept my opinion to my self . then i found out the kids didnt tapmper with the yard ..i finally took a pic with my cell phone on sunday .. got alot of reponsses back ppl saying it looked like a landing spot of small ufo...i then called and a policeman came out monday and he said he never seen anything like it .. i asked him what would he do .. he said soil samples . i called the ppl from the county they dont check for low radiaon levels . but they came out tuesday and looked at it and said they never seen anything like it .. and told me to get a ufo investigator out here they didnt take samples.. grass is begining to come back on the lower part of the circle and square now the land is not flat no pool or trampoline was ever there .. not much that i can really say about the spot .. but i will send the picture ..i have already but this way it might be seen sooner ..any imput would be great .. i do not want media .. or govt involved.. i have children that wouldnt appreciate publicity .. we talked about it . I will say this if it is a landing spot no one in my house was harmed and i still feel safe . I am not affraid .. if it is i feel it is comforting to me ..
